column4: has anyone installed vnc4server with fiesty.  I have read that there is a bug but also a fix.  I can not get it to work
what do you want to do with vnc4server?    vnc to an active X session? try x11vnc
acutally I just want to run a vnc server.  I would prefer the easiest.  vnc4server was suggested.  Do you have better advice?
no that seems fine. had you looked at nx at all? either freenx or nomachine's nx?
I have only tried vnc4server.  I am trying just using remote desktop off of heguru's suggestion
ok. give a look to nomachine's nx or the freenx packages
